snippet: Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of murdering 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979, broke down during a religious retreat that year and confessed to killing a child, witnesses at his trial said.
abstract: Two witnesses offer testimony in murder trial of Pedro Hernandez, charged with 1979 murder of 6-year-old Etan Patz; both recall Hernandez's prayer group admission of killing a child, months after the boy's disappearance near his Manhattan home.
lead_paragraph: Pedro Hernandez, who is accused of murdering 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979, broke down during a religious retreat that year and confessed to killing a child, witnesses at his trial said.

headline.main: In Patz Case, 2 More Testify to Defendant’s Confession in 1979
headline.print_headline: In Patz Case, 2 More Testify to Admission by Defendant
